config:
  theme: neo-dark
  look: neo
  layout: fixed
---
flowchart LR
 subgraph CI_CD["GitHub Actions CI/CD Pipeline"]
    direction LR
        Repo["GitHub Actions"]
        Docker["Docker Build & Test"]
  end
 subgraph AppService["Azure App Service"]
    direction LR
        FE["SolidJS/TypeScript Frontend"]
        BE["Golang Server"]
        RS["Redis Sidecar"]
  end
 subgraph Observability["Observability ACIs"]
        Prom["Prometheus"]
        Graf["Grafana"]
        ELK["ELK Stack"]
  end
 subgraph VNET["Azure Virtual Network"]
        ACR["Azure Container Registry"]
        AppService
        DB["Azure Database for PostgreSQL"]
        KV["Azure Key Vault"]
        Observability
  end
    UserBrowser["UserBrowser"] --> FE
    Repo --> Docker
    Docker --> ACR
    ACR --> AppService
    FE <--> BE
    BE <--> RS & DB & Prom & Graf & ELK
    FE --> KV
    BE --> KV
    RS@{ shape: cyl}
    DB@{ shape: cyl}
    KV@{ shape: cyl}

    style AppService fill:#181818
    style VNET fill:#242424
